doc.field: Print matter re training includes: 3 textbooks on general management. 4 catalogs/bulletins from John Jay College (2001-06). FLSTP (First Line Supervisors Training Program) material: 4 week curriculum overview (2004), "Code Enforcement & Referrals" course material for 2005-06. Probationary Firefighter School course material re code enforcement/summonses (NOVs/notice of violations procedures); there are several copies of the course material. Bound docs on "Fire Prevention", likely in connection with Battalion Chief Annual Training Day, for which there are a couple folders of material. A CD re: Captain's Day, 2005. There is a memo here providing an overview of the layers of training. (Relates directly to box 9758 above.) (Includes digital formats)
